replies.body:
Hello kawaii red! 

There could be one of the following issues that prevents you from gifting:

- You or your friend have either a chat restriction, ban or other source of penalty on your account. 
- You can only send a maximum amount of 10 gifts every 24 hours.
- Your friend has been added to your friendlist less than 24 hours ago.

I hope that helps you for now! 

>  Whoever  finds spelling errors may keep them
ty i was wondering why ma new frnd could'nt gift me... this explains:)

Ooooh I see!

Thanks a bunch!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} (thesearesocoolomg)
If a friend has a ban cant get gifts from me? i mean can i send him a skin?

Hey kawaii red,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating. These poros really don't want to be thrown. D:
this is back, one of my friends tried to gift one of my other friends one and he got the error, just happened a few secs ago
